channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With So Much Uncertainty, Can You Reliably Build Generational Wealth From Passive Real Estate Investments?
item.description: From proposals to cap rent increases, all the way down to rent control, is the uncertainty in today's market enough to make investors leave it altogether?

item.title: Faulty CrowdStrike update causes major global IT outage, taking out banks, airlines and businesses globally
item.description: Security giant CrowdStrike said the outage was not caused by a cyberattack, as businesses anticipate widespread disruption. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Jules and Samantha
item.description: Jules and Samantha Werkheiser fought their wrongful convictions for over a decade. Here’s their journey of survival — and motherhood — in pictures.

item.title: Real Estate Investors Are Making These 6 Costly Mistakes. Don’t Be One of Them.
item.description: Investors in both stocks and real estate are making the same mistakes right now. Here's what you need to be aware of.

item.title: US cyber agency CISA says malicious hackers are ‘taking advantage’ of CrowdStrike outage
item.description: CISA confirmed the CrowdStrike outage was not caused by a cyberattack, but urged caution as malicious hackers exploit the situation. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in This New Podcast Series
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: Home Construction Is Undergoing a Revolution. Here’s How Investors Will Benefit.
item.description: Will we be able to hit "print" and generate housing one day? It could be sooner than you think.

item.title: These startups are trying to prevent another CrowdStrike-like outage, according to VCs
item.description: The global outage is a perfect reminder how much of the world relies on technological infrastructure. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know About J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice
item.description: On immigration and more, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.

item.title: Don’t Risk Your Money: Check These Stats Before Selecting Your Investment Market
item.description: Choosing the right market to invest in is your most important investment decision.

item.title: CrowdStrike outage: How your plane, train and automobile travel may be affected
item.description: The CrowdStrike outage that hit early Friday morning and knocked out computers running Microsoft Windows has grounded flights globally. Major U.S. airlines including United Airlines, American Airlines and Delta Air Lines have halted flight operations around the world. According to FlightAware, which is tracking the cancellations live, 7% of United Airlines flights, 8% of American […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How a Supreme Court Ruling Could Affect a Case Involving Police Abuse of Youth
item.description: Another court must now decide how the landmark ruling will impact the Boy Scouts abuse settlement, which involves victims of police sexual abuse.

item.title: A World Without Airbnb & Why “Sinking” Could Cause Your Insurance to Skyrocket
item.description: Airbnb bans escalate, a “tsunami” could be coming for this real estate niche, and “sinking” cities lead to skyrocketing insurance prices. The housing market changes every week, so we’re here […]

item.title: Twitch reinstates Trump’s account ahead of the 2024 presidential election
item.description: Prior to the ban, Trump's team used his channel to broadcast some of his campaigns. With the ban now lifted, his channel can resume doing so. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Jackson, Mississippi, Wants Curfew Centers to Cut Crime. Here’s What Other Cities Learned.
item.description: After a teen’s murder, city officials hope a curfew and youth centers will get kids off the street. Young people are skeptical.
